JobFullDesc: Do you enjoy working with cutting edge technology to solve tough problems? Our Technology group is comprised of deeply passionate and experienced professionals who guide clients through their most complex technology challenges. If you are seeking a role that offers you the opportunity to work with GPS clients through critical issues, consider a career in Deloitte's GPS Technology practice.  Work you'll do As a Project Delivery Lead in the Technology group you will:  Provide client service delivery and operations execution  Collaborate with and manage project teams comprised of other staff to execute a portion of the project scope  Provide expertise on engagements related but not limited to Systems Implementation, Operations & Maintenance, Helpdesk Operations, Software Application Development and Maintenance  Lead one or more work streams on large engagements of moderate size and complexity  Lead deliverables creation, directs and reviews the work of others for quality and accuracy  Generate project milestones and delivery schedule   The Team   Transparency, innovation, collaboration, sustainability: these are the hallmark issues shaping government initiatives today. Deloitte's GPS practice is passionate about making an impact with lasting change. Carrying out missions in the GPS practice requires fresh thinking and a creative approach. We collaborate with teams from across our organization in order to bring the full breadth of Deloitte, its commercial and public sector expertise, to best support our clients. Our aspiration is to be the premier integrated solutions provider in helping to transform the GPS marketplace. Our Technology team works with clients to help them develop custom software solutions, manage their applications and databases, and provide strategic recommendations to help them optimize their businesses' operations, processes, and performance.  Qualifications Required:  Typically has 13 or more years of consulting and/or industry experience   Bachelor's Degree  Preferred:  Prior professional services or government consulting experience  Ability to manage engagements of greater than average size and complexity  Professional oral and written communication skills, and presentation skills  Problem solving and troubleshooting skills  Ability to mentor and manage engagement staff and further their professional growth
